entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing rain changing to rain showers or drizzle this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
